gen:link.msg:message: The reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`, because `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PrecondEquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PrecondEquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SAdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SAdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`, because `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PrecondEquityDirectlyMaterialErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PrecondEquityDirectlyMaterialErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_SAdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_SAdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `Equity` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`, because `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` is not reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `Equity` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`, because `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors` is not reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_SEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_SEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` SHOULD be equal to + `Equity` + `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` + `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors`, because `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_PrecondEquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_PrecondEquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_Equity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_Equity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` SHOULD be equal to + `Equity` + `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` + `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors`, because `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_PrecondEquityDirectlyMaterialErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_PrecondEquityDirectlyMaterialErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_Equity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_Equity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables2_EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E1_EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E1_EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E2_EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E2_EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChanges_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
